articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: European Union agrees on new $54bn aid package for Ukraine - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Hungary previously vetoed the measure and criticised the bloc’s military support for Ukraine.
articles.content:
All 27 European Union countries have agreed on an additional 50-billion-euro ($54bn) aid package for Ukraine, despite threats from Hungary to veto the move.
We have a deal, European Council Presiden… [+4373 chars]

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.
